data.title: Caddy Shack
data.text: Stopped by this local neighborhood bar  on a Sunday night - menu was typical small bar food - we ordered a couple philly cheese steak sandwiches and a few patty melts  after some popcorn chicken and onion appetizers - bar tender was very polite and took out drink order and let us check the menu - a while before ordering -  not a lot of places for groups to sit if eating  as most of crowd was watching football games  - My patty melt was served on bread and was very good - fries came with the order - all in all , our food was very good and the service was good - sandwiches prices were very reasonable at about 5.50 -6 and beers around $3 - will be back again
